com.paypal.selion.platform.asserts

Class SeLionSoftAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testng.asserts.Assertion
      • com.paypal.selion.platform.asserts.SeLionSoftAssert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.testng.asserts.IAssertLifecycle

    public final class SeLionSoftAssert
extends org.testng.asserts.Assertion
    SeLion Soft Asserts which provides the capability to log the asserts and their status. But the test continue to run till the end of the test method.

      • assertAll

        public void assertAll()
        This method should be called in order for all the soft asserts to be evaluated. This is also called by SeLionAssertsListener.afterInvocation(org.testng.IInvokedMethod, ITestResult).
